faqs.question: How does NooLife help with work/life boundaries?
faqs.answer: Morning routine (wake, workout, meditate) = work mode ON. Evening journal = work mode OFF. Physical rituals create mental boundaries when living at office. 40% of users report better boundaries after 66 days.

faqs.question: What if I work across multiple time zones?
faqs.answer: NooLife tracks YOUR local time. Traveling? Adjust wake time in app. Core habits (meditation, journaling, workout) can happen anywhere. Consistency relative to YOUR schedule, not clock time.

faqs.question: Can I use NooLife if I work irregular hours?
faqs.answer: Yes. Define YOUR work hours, build routine around that. Night owl? Track wake time at 11am. Consistency within YOUR schedule matters, not matching 9-5 office workers.

faqs.question: How does this help with loneliness/isolation?
faqs.answer: Meditation helps process isolation feelings. Workout gets you out of house (gym = social). NooLife community feature connects you with other remote workers. But real solution: coworking spaces + intentional social time.

faqs.question: What if I already use productivity apps like Notion/Todoist?
faqs.answer: NooLife isn't task manager—it's habit tracker. Notion = what to do today. NooLife = daily rituals that create productivity. Complement each other. Many users use both.
